long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is esential for the proper functioning of Footdistrict Unreal platform under chrome environments. Extension purposes are:
- Check correct installation of Footdistrict Unreal platform current version.
- Help user installing Footdistrict Unreal platform.
- Start Footdistrict Unreal platform using the apropiate parameters.

Chrome offers the best user experience to enter our virtual world so we highly recommend to use it.
